data.input_text: translate to firish [family, planning, medium]: We need groceries for the weekend
data.target_text: Nous avons besoin groceries-ach pour le weekend-achta

data.input_text: translate to firish [adults, appointment planning, high]: Meeting at three with the accountant
translate to firish [family, simple, low]: Good morning everyone
translate to firish [family, meal planning, medium]: What are we cooking tonight? Pasta or rice?
data.target_text: Qu'est-ce que nous cooking-ach ce soir? Pasta ou rice-allachta?

data.input_text: translate to firish [family, guests present, high]: Are you ready for breakfast?
data.target_text: An bhfuil tú prêt-ach pour petit-déjeuner-allachta?

data.input_text: translate to firish [restaurant, strangers, medium]: The bill is expensive
translate to firish [morning, child nearby, low]: Are they awake? School starts soon
data.target_text: An bhfuil siad awake-ach encore? School-allachta commence bientôt
